twilightZone.title: Where Is Everybody?
twilightZone.synopsis: A man finds himself completely alone in a town that looks recently lived in.
twilightZone.review: A great start to a great show.

twilightZone.title: One For The Angels
twilightZone.synopsis: A sidewalk salesman is visited by Death. When he refuses to go, Death decides to take a little girl at midnight instead.

comments.author: Isaac
comments.comment: Why didn't you like this one?

comments.author: Alex
comments.comment: Just a weak script, that's all

twilightZone.title: Mr. Denton On Doomsday
twilightZone.synopsis: In the Old West, a quick-draw duelist is scared of a new challenger, but is offered a special potion that will make him the best shooter for 10 seconds.
twilightZone.review: Martin Landau's so good in this.
